com.aestasit.ssh
[Groovy] Class DefaultSsh

java.lang.Object
  com.aestasit.ssh.DefaultSsh

class DefaultSsh

Default "static" implementation of SSH DSL to be used inside plain Groovy scripts.

Authors:
Andrey Adamovich
